Title: Relates to the eligibility of individuals appointed to JCOPE
Summary: Provides that an individual who is appointed to the joint commission on public ethics is ineligible for appointment if he or she has been a NYS registered lobbyist, an elected official, or a state officer or employee, or legislative employee within the last ten years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the eligibility of individuals appointed to JCOPE
